## detectTerminalBackground() function

Detect terminal background from environment variables. Works in Node.js by accessing globalThis.process.env without Node-specific imports.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function detectTerminalBackground(): TerminalBackground;
```
**Returns:**

[TerminalBackground](./core.terminalbackground.md)

Terminal background mode
